r.d: This extension provides an IBM database driver for PDO. This driver supports IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, Apache Derby databases and IDS (Informix Data Server).
r.n: * 2022-03-21: 1.5.0 - PHP 8.1 support - On IBM i, support INI option for CCSID override - On IBM i, support INI option for pessimistic DBCS alloc - Resolve crash with LOBs - Fix build issues with MSVC - Fix detecting CLI driver on 64-bit Windows - Use modern PDO includes check (resolves compatibility with i.e. Ubuntu, MacPorts) - Fix tests for PHP 8.1 and modern Db2 LUW - Clean up IBM i command helpers - Fix improper return types and declarations
